item.description:
Love takes courage and integrity. So, you loved, you gave, you cherished and shared everything. You opened your heart and let someone in, sharing your deepest joys and sorrows, daring to let another into your experience; then things changed. They left, or they found someone else, or you did. The grief of a broken heart allows for either new insights to open or a closing down to the flow of life and love ever moving through again. Mother Clare will guide you to keeping your heart open through what can feel like a tremendous task in order to stay connected and real with the people around you. Come, heal your heart and live again.

Suggested Donation $25, Bring a Friend for Free!
item.name: The Broken Heart with Mother Clare Watts
